sentences.en: A French carved limestone fireplace mantel in the Rococo manner of Louis XV.
sentences.cn: 法国石灰石雕刻在路易十五洛可可方式壁炉.

sentences.en: As I did, two beautiful cups gleamed from the mantel.
sentences.cn: 当我这么做的时候，壁炉架上有两座漂亮的奖杯微光一闪。

sentences.en: Be careful not to strike your head against the mantel.
sentences.cn: 小心不要使你的头撞到壁炉架.

sentences.en: Even the mantel above the fire glowed white.
sentences.cn: 甚至炉火上方的壁炉台都泛着白光。

sentences.en: Favorite Element: Details from the original construction that were restored by previous owners: the parquet floor design at the entry, the stained glass windows, and carved wood mantel.
sentences.cn: 最喜欢的元素：被前任屋主恢复的房间原始的装饰细节：进门处的镶木地板，上了色的玻璃窗，手工雕刻的木质壁炉架。

sentences.en: He had thrust his chest out, supporting his shoulders against the mantel.
sentences.cn: 他挺起胸脯, 肩膊抵着壁炉架.

sentences.en: He would display the photograph on the living room mantel.
sentences.cn: 他也可以在客厅的壁炉边上展示他的照片。

sentences.en: In Britain they call a mantel a chimneypiece.
Kein Problem. Hier habe ich einen Mantel, einen ( westlichen ) Anzug und eine Wolldecke.
sentences.cn: 没问题. 我这儿有一件大衣,一套西装,和一床羊毛毯.

sentences.en: Marble Fireplace, Marble Mantel , Fireplace Sets , Fireplace Accessories Fire Brike Fire Coal, Stone Statue Sculptures.
sentences.cn: 采购产品大理石壁炉, 大理石, 壁炉, 壁炉配件,火煤,石像雕刻.

sentences.en: NBD employed waxed Brazilian teak for the stairs, floor, and mantel.
sentences.cn: NBD公司采用了上过蜡的西班牙柚木装点楼梯 、 地面及壁炉架.

sentences.en: On the mantel a bust of Keats on a pedestal.
sentences.cn: 壁炉台上有一尊放在垫座上的济慈胸像.

sentences.en: On the mantel were photographs of a man and a woman.
sentences.cn: 壁炉架上面是一对男女的一些照片。

sentences.en: Remove all objects from mantel to see if this eliminates the smell.
sentences.cn: 把它们都移开,看能否消除气味.

sentences.en: She was tired and her mind ticked away dully, mechanically, as the clock on the mantel.
sentences.cn: 她疲倦,她的心在迟钝地机械的跳动, 就像壁炉架上那座时钟似的.

sentences.en: Soot was blown down into the mantel.
sentences.cn: 烟灰被扫落到壁炉台上.

sentences.en: We love the little carved Chinese figures, and they'll be just perfect on our mantel.
sentences.cn: 我们喜欢这些小巧玲珑的中国雕塑品, 把它们放在壁炉架上,真是再合适不过了.

sentences.en: Why have I described somebody's real ceramic elephant sitting on the mantel - piece?
sentences.cn: 为什么我要如实地描写某人安放在壁炉台上的那只陶瓷大象 呢 ?
